sources.name: US Census and WDI
sources.description:
Data published by (a) Historical Statistics of the United States Colonial Times to 1970 (1929-1970)
(b) US Census Statistical Abstract 1990 (1970-1990) 
(c) World Bank WDI (1990-2013)
Data publisher's source (a) and (b) from US Bureau of the Census (1929-1989)
(c) based on World Health Organization Global Health Expenditure database
